ygData.subject: RE: Bard's Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: Good question!~  I presume you mean besides the ones that you buy from your bard guild? Mino horn - found on dead minos - good to use as a wind instrument.
ygData.messageBody:
Good question!~ I presume you mean besides the ones that you buy from your
bard guild?

Mino horn - found on dead minos - good to use as a wind instrument. Can get
from 12 to 15 with a party and solo above 15-16??

Battle Drum - found in MistMoore?? - good to use as percussion - does it
have extra strength? Need to be 30's and up to get?

Lute of the Gypsy Princess - not sure where - part of a quest? can it even
be played as instrument?

That's all I know - but I'd sure like to know more!

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jamie [mailto:bribed@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 7:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard's Instruments

From: "Jamie" <bribed@...>

I've been looking for a listing of instruments, their powers
and where to
find them (or how much to pay for em) but I can't find
any...maybe we could
compile a list ourselves...anyone have any info?


Taluvil, 12th bard
